pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Twirssi allows you to post to Twitter and Identi.ca from net-irc/irssi, as well as:
* Read your friend feed, and your replies (from people on and not on your feed). * Receive and send direct messages (DMs) * Use multiple accounts, on either twitter or identi.ca - follow, read and post * See the context when your friends reply to users you aren't following
